ComMainCloth_W_007_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>All of these details come from my various
fashion-forward friends, who travel in
other regions.
But I'm not sure any of these treasures
are quite right for me, given I don't like
to battle, and I don't climb cliffs.
ComMainCloth_W_007_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>If you're attempting a difficult journey, I'm
sure such styles could come in handy!
ComMainCloth_W_006_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>A piece from a "very snappy" outfit from
Misko's collection, said to <clr:0000>keep you safe
in lightning<clr:ffff>, is supposed to be here...
ComMainCloth_W_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, sorry.<sp:5:0:0> I've gone on and on. It's been
a while since I've been able to talk fashion
with anyone.
Time for me to get back to searching for
Misko's legendary outfits. Good luck!<sp:5:0:0>
And goodbye!
Fairy0022_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>She should be near <clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff>
in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>, if I recall that correctly.
ComMainCloth_W_004_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>A piece of a "fairly wild" outfit from
Misko's collection, said to <clr:0000>fill the wearer
with power<clr:ffff>, might be here...
Second0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>The pieces of Misko's legendary wardrobe
are said to be scattered across the land.<sp:5:0:0>
Join our search for them!
If I find any pieces of Misko's treasure,
I definitely want to get them blessed by
the Great Fairies!
Fairy0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>By the way...<sp:5:0:0> Could it be that the
reason you're traveling is to look
for the Great Fairies?
Fairy0021_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Around here...<sp:5:0:0>the closest one would be
the <clr:0000>Great Fairy Mija<clr:ffff>.
Fairy0022_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>She should be near <clr:0000>Woodland Stable <clr:ffff>in
the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>, if I recall that correctly.
Second0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But since so much ugliness came to this
land...<sp:5:0:0>I've heard that they've withdrawn
from view.
Fairy0021_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Around here...<sp:5:0:0>the closest one would be
the <clr:0000>Great Fairy Tera<clr:ffff>.
Fairy0022_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>She should be near <clr:0000>Woodland Stable <clr:ffff>in
the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>, if I recall that correctly.
Fairy0021_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Around here...<sp:5:0:0>the closest one would be
the <clr:0000>Great Fairy Cotera<clr:ffff>...
Fairy0022_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>She should be near <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable<clr:ffff>
in the <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff>, if I recall that correctly.
Fairy0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>If you are near there, you should stop by
and ask for your clothing to get blessed!
Fairy0021_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Around here...<sp:5:0:0>the closest one would be
the <clr:0000>Great Fairy Kaysa<clr:ffff>.
Fairy0022_02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>She should be near <clr:0000>Woodland Stable <clr:ffff>in
the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>, if I recall that correctly.
Fairy0022_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>She should be near <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable
around here<clr:ffff>, if I recall that correctly.
Fairy0022_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>She should be near <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable
around here<clr:ffff>, if I recall that correctly.
Fairy0022_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>She should be near <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable <clr:ffff>in the
<clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff>, if I recall that correctly.
Fairy0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That reminds me!<sp:5:0:0> Do you know about
the <clr:0000>Great Fairies<clr:ffff>?
Talk03_01:
<snd:Ease_01>Fate must have conspired to bring us
back together.<sp:0:4:0>I know you weren't interested in <clr:0000>Misko's
treasure<clr:ffff> the other day, but should I tell
you where it's hidden now?
Fairy0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>The Great Fairies have long existed
throughout Hyrule, and have been
known to bless clothing.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But since so much ugliness came to our
land...<sp:5:0:0>I've heard that they've withdrawn
from view.
Talk01:
<snd:LaughS>I thought that might strike your
fashionable fancy!<sp:5:1:0> Now...<sp:5:0:0>do you have
a <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>?
Talk02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS>Oh...<sp:5:1:0> So you're still not interested?<sp:5:1:0> Well,
to each their own when it comes to travel.

<snd:Greeting_01>And I prefer the added flavor of the
treasure hunt!<sp:5:1:0> I'm going to get back to it,
but do come chat if you see me again!
Fairy0022_07_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>She should be near <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable <clr:ffff>in the
<clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>, if I recall that correctly.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS>Oh?<sp:5:1:0> No interest in treasure hunting,
then?<sp:5:1:0> Well, everyone's free to travel
as they please, I suppose.
On that note, I should probably get back
to my own journey. It's been a pleasure
chatting with you.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>I plan to visit every region, so be sure to
say hello if you catch sight of me again!<sp:0:4:0>Farewell for now!
ComMainCloth_W_005_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>A piece from a "quite stylish" outfit
from Misko's collection, said to <clr:0000>let you
quickly climb cliffs<clr:ffff>, could be here...
Fairy0003_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though I think one of them was spotted
near <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Eldin<clr:ffff> recently.<sp:5:0:0>
I wonder what that's about?
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>If it isn't the fashionable traveler!<sp:5:1:0>
How have you been?<sp:0:4:0>Personally, I'm still on the lookout for
pieces of <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>!
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>What?<sp:5:1:0> Did I hear that right?<sp:5:1:0> You found
<clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>?!<sp:0:4:0>And you found all three places I was going
to tell you about all by yourself?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>That's incredible!<sp:5:1:0> You were playing it cool,
but you were a master treasure hunter
all along!
I had so many rumors to share with you,
but...<sp:5:1:0> Ha! <sp:5:0:0>Clearly you didn't need them.
Fairy0003_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though I think one of them was seen
around <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>
recently.<sp:5:0:0> I wonder what that's all about?
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS>Hehe.<sp:5:1:0> Well, look who came right back!
<sp:5:1:0>I knew you wouldn't be able to resist
those legendary clothes.<sp:0:4:0>So, shall I tell you where <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>
is rumored to be hidden after all?
Fairy0003_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though I think one of them was spotted
near <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>
recently.<sp:5:0:0> I wonder what that's all about?
Fairy0003_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though I think one of them was seen
near <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> lately.<sp:5:0:0>
What could that be all about?
ComMainCloth_W_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello there!<sp:5:0:0> I hope your travels are
treating you well.

So, I take it, if you've struck up a
conversation with a fashion-forward
type like me, all the way out here...
you must also be searching for pieces
of <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>?
ComMainCloth_W_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> You don't know?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>There was once a <clr:0000>legendary bandit<clr:ffff> by
the name of <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff>. But thievery isn't
what made them a legend...
<sp:3:0:2:0100>It was their unparalleled fashion sense!


It's said that Misko collected rare outfits
from all over the world and hid their
pieces throughout Hyrule.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>It may only be a story, but who could
resist the call of garments like that?

For fashion lovers like me, <clr:0000>Misko's
treasure<clr:ffff> is the ultimate score. That's why
we're out in force trying to find it!
ComMainCloth_W_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>So!<sp:5:0:0> Fate and fashion must have brought
the two of us together, right here!

Shall I tell you where pieces of <clr:0000>Misko's
treasure<clr:ffff> are said to be hidden?
Fairy0003_03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though I think one of them was seen
near <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>
recently.<sp:5:0:0> What's that about, I wonder?
ComMainCloth_W_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>A piece of a "fairly wild" outfit from
Misko's collection, said to <clr:0000>fill the wearer
with power<clr:ffff>, is around here...
ComNakedCheck_W_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Sorry...<sp:0:4:0>I don't think you and I will have a
lot in common if you're wearing so
little clothing.
So, if you'll excuse me...
ComMainCloth_W_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>A piece from a "quite stylish" outfit
from Misko's collection, said to <clr:0000>let you
quickly climb cliffs<clr:ffff>, might be here...
ComMainCloth_W_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>A piece from a "very snappy" outfit
from Misko's collection, said to <clr:0000>keep you
safe in lightning<clr:ffff>, is around here...
ComMainCloth_W_007_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>All of this information comes from my
other fashion-forward friends, who travel
in other regions.
I'm not sure if any of these looks will fit
with my personal sense of style, but you
never know...
